PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02882011-03-03,  ,  PS,  , 
ActRoyal Canadian Mounted Police Act
SubjectAppointment Assistant Commissioner - Non-Commissioned Officer (NCO) **RCMP**
PrecisOrder appointing a non-commissioned officer from the Edmonton Police Service to the rank of Assistant Commissioner and authorizing the issue of a commission under the Great Seal of Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
